This chunk describes additional keyword arguments for the `DirectEntry` widget in Panda3D's GUI system, specifically focusing on focus-related behaviors. It explains how the text entry field interacts with user input when gaining or losing focus, including optional commands to execute during these states and any extra arguments required by those commands. This context is essential for developers wanting to customize the behavior of interactive text fields in their applications.
